      • getMessageButtonViews

        public java.util.List<android.view.View> getMessageButtonViews()
        Description copied from interface: IInAppMessageImmersiveView
        Gets the message button Views so that Appboy can add click listeners to them.
        Specified by:
        getMessageButtonViews in interface IInAppMessageImmersiveView
        Specified by:
        getMessageButtonViews in class AppboyInAppMessageImmersiveBaseView
        Returns:
        the child Views that display the message buttons. They should be returned in the same order as the List on the in-app message object so that listeners are set correctly.

      • getMessageSimpleDraweeView

        public android.view.View getMessageSimpleDraweeView()
        Description copied from class: AppboyInAppMessageBaseView
        In cases where the Fresco library isn't provided, we can't have the SimpleDraweeView class as actual signature of this method. Thus, we return View for this method and cast it when needed.
        Specified by:
        getMessageSimpleDraweeView in class AppboyInAppMessageBaseView
